page.title: 05HOUSING - BARGOED AREA
page.content: Of domestic properties in the area 1641 are council owned and 561 other - tenanted. There are 3250 owner occupied properties in this area at the present time (July 1985). The total number of domestic properties is 5452. There are 518 properties with rateable values of <Â£50. This means that the approximate rates for these properties for 1985/86 would be <Â£100. 1930 properties have rateable values of between Â£51 and Â£75, 1381 with rateable values from Â£76 to Â£100, 899 with rateable values of between Â£101 and Â£125 and 298 properties with rateable values from Â£126 to Â£150. Properties with rateable values of >Â£150 number 426; the approximate rates for these would be >Â£300. These statistics seem to show that most properties appear in the lower bands of rateable values.
